title: [Question] How do i know my pesu academy username after i changed my mail id that was linked to to my account.
content:
Hey Guys,  
So i changed the mail id and passowrd in my pesuacademy account and when i sign in now it says that my username and password does not match.  
Before my changed my mail id my user id was the previous existing mail id.  
Any solutions ??

comments.body: The username field can be either your PRN, SRN, email or phone number. You can use any of them with your password to log in to PESU Academy.
